Wow, that was really great! I'm going to recommend it to all my friends!
The movie was so good, I held stopped my bladder for over an hour!
It was alright, it definitely served a good time-killer.
I wanted to get a good nap during the movie, but it was too cold.
What the heck did I just see?
If you only see one movie this year, this should be it!
This is a movie that will stick with me for the rest of my life.
There wasn't much of a plot but visually it was amazing.
I think I would have been better off going for a run in the park than watching that.
It was so not worth dropping money to see this movie in theaters.
This movie renewed my faith in mainstream movies!
Typical movie with a happy ending, not great, not awful
It's cliché but its good.

It's a complete piece of junk. Did not like it.
Worthy of the buzz its created.

I really don't understand what all the hype is about.
Messy plot, plot holes and terrible acting.
Top grade actors and a great script but in the end it just does not come together.
